content.introduction:
Finds unused 
using
 declarations.

Unused 
using
 declarations in header files will not be diagnosed
since these using declarations are part of the headerâs public API.
Allowed header file extensions can be configured via the global
option 
HeaderFileExtensions
.

Example:

// main.cpp


namespace
 
n
 
{
 
class
 
C
;
 
}


using
 
n
::
C
;
  
// Never actually used.
